review: I strongly recommend Sonai Rani's consultation, she takes care of every minute detail to attention and suggest medicines accordingly, she is kind and always explains crystal clearly and makes us understand things better with lot of patience. We are blessed with baby boy through normal delivery because of her, we are always eternally greatful to her, thank you very much mam.her team also responds promptly which is very crucial, kudos to them as well.

It is very emotional and overwhelming  period for the expectant couple, who are preparing to welcome their own child into the world. There is a lot information to remember and situation is very likely to be mind-boggling through lot of questions. Knowing an excellent medical professional like Dr Sonia Rani, is obviously a great feeling and reassuring amongst bundles of uncertainty.  Dr. Sonia Rani can be rated as TOP class doctor , who possess rare blend of professional capabilities, excellent inter personal skills and always willing to be supportive and approachable.

Strongly recommend Dr Sonia Rani, to anybody  who want to ponder great medical services along with peace of mind.

Let me explain, we recently consulted her for MTP and she mentioned a price for the procedure and we felt its high and asked her if it's high a bit. We had a 1-2 minute discussion and after that she thought these guys may not proceed at her clinic and simply said "if you can get the MTP outside you take it yourself but she said she will not assist my wife for any bleeding or other issues and she pressed the calling bell for next patient". We felt its very absud, she didn't actually cared about my wife's health. *** ***** **** ***** ** ** ***** ******* *** ** ** ******** ***** **** *** * ** * ************ *** * ** ********** ****** *** ******* *** *** *** ********** *** ** *****
Last thing is, she didn't even care to reply on Practo. We took appointment from Practo for which we expect chat support at least from the doc but she never cared to reply.

She is practical doctor and explains the problems and listens to you in detail I am currently undergoing an treatment under her if it goes well will update my review over here like how it went till now satisfied with the service
Doctor gave very good suggestions for betterment in my case. listens to us and friendly.Thank you doctor.
Dr Sonia is very friendly and patient doctor. she gives enough time to understand the problem and explains in detail about the solution
Dr Sonia mam is a amazing gynaecologist. she is very patient understanding and friendly. also hospital is very good
Dr sonia is very nice and friendly. went for first time for consultation & very happy with treatment
